title: Georgia
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015124108/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Typefaces](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015124108/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typefaces) : Georgia**

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015124108im_/http:/upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/b/ba/GeorgiaSpecimenAIB.svg)

The “essential” [serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015124108/http:/typophile.com/wiki/serif) face for reading on screen. Designed by [Matthew Carter](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015124108/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Matthew%20Carter) for [Microsoft](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015124108/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Microsoft). Based on the [Scotch Roman](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015124108/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Scotch%20Roman) model.
author: paul d hunt
